speaker: Verso
line: There’s an abnormal Nevron roaming about and it has a taste for Expeditioner armbands.

speaker: Gestral
line: (gibberish) Oh, hello, I suppose you want to fight?

speaker: Gestral
line: (gibberish) Oh, you’re the first person I’ve met who doesn’t.

speaker: Gestral
line: (gibberish) Uh, it’s a first. Can’t you see? A few of your Expeditioner friends are here too.

speaker: Lune
line: Other survivors?! Can you show us?

speaker: Gestral
line: (gibberish) Oh, yeah, no, they’re dead. Easy to spot, you’ll see them along the way. Just avoid going to the top of the cliff and you’ll be fine. The big one over there is… Yeah, maybe don’t go there.

speaker: Gestral
line: (gibberish) Suit yourself. I’ll keep an eye out for Expedition 32. Have fun and try not to die.

speaker: Young boy
line: (gibberish) You… You… breathe? I thought her paintings took you all. I wish I could understand… Why she does that…

speaker: Young boy
line: (gibberish) She’s always been there. From the moment I was born. Could you find her? Maybe she will talk to you. Ask her why… She killed them all…

speaker: Young boy
line: (gibberish) Thank you… A part of her is around here.

speaker: Lune
line: (Is this the person the boy mentioned?)

speaker: Lune
line: We met a boy, he asked us to talk to you.

speaker: Lune
line: He asked, why are your paintings taking us all?

speaker: Lady of Sap
line: (gibberish) … I do it for him… I do it for us… To respect… What he created… What we created…

speaker: Lune
line: (It has gone silent again… We should report back to the boy.)

speaker: Young boy
line: (gibberish) Please, find her… And ask her why she kills them all…

speaker: Lune
line: That she is doing this for you. To respect what you created, with her.

speaker: Young boy
line: (gibberish) But… But… That’s not… What I wanted… I never… Please… Maybe you can do it… Stop her paintings from erasing any more… Be careful… (The boy has gone silent.)

speaker: Young boy
line: (gibberish) You succeeded… Thank you… Thank you… Take this? It is a song she used to play to me, when we were together…

speaker: Lune
line: This looks similar to Lumière’s shield dome. Maybe we can just cross it.

speaker: Verso
line: (laught) I’m telling you, we can’t. Axons first. It’s ok, you’ll be fine.
